transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: *{box-sizing:border-box;font-family:Verdana,sans-serif}div#app,html{height:600px;width:100%}div#app div#login{align-items:center;background-color:#e2e2e5;display:flex;height:100%;justify-content:center;width:100%}div#app div#login div#description{background-color:#fff;padding:35px;width:280px}div#app div#login div#description h1,div#app div#login div#description p{margin:0}div#app div#login div#description p{color:#030303;font-size:.8em;margin-top:10px}div#app div#login div#form{background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 30px 0 #000;color:#000;padding:20px;width:350px}div#app div#login div#form input,div#app div#login div#form label{outline:none;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form label{color:#000;font-size:.8em}div#app div#login div#form ::-moz-placeholder{color:#0d0d0d;opacity:1}div#app div#login div#form ::placeholder{color:#0d0d0d;opacity:1}div#app div#login div#form button{background-color:#fff;border:none;cursor:pointer;transition:background-color .2s ease-in-out;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form button:hover{background-color:#eee}@media screen and (max-width:600px){div#app div#login{align-items:unset;background-color:unset;display:unset;justify-content:unset}div#app div#login div#description{margin:0 auto;max-width:350px;text-align:center;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form{border-radius:unset;box-shadow:unset;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form form{margin:0 auto;max-width:280px;width:100%}}

transforms.name: vite:vue
transforms.result: *{box-sizing:border-box;font-family:Verdana,sans-serif}div#app,html{height:600px;width:100%}div#app div#login{align-items:center;background-color:#e2e2e5;display:flex;height:100%;justify-content:center;width:100%}div#app div#login div#description{background-color:#fff;padding:35px;width:280px}div#app div#login div#description h1,div#app div#login div#description p{margin:0}div#app div#login div#description p{color:#030303;font-size:.8em;margin-top:10px}div#app div#login div#form{background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 30px 0 #000;color:#000;padding:20px;width:350px}div#app div#login div#form input,div#app div#login div#form label{outline:none;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form label{color:#000;font-size:.8em}div#app div#login div#form ::-moz-placeholder{color:#0d0d0d;opacity:1}div#app div#login div#form ::placeholder{color:#0d0d0d;opacity:1}div#app div#login div#form button{background-color:#fff;border:none;cursor:pointer;transition:background-color .2s ease-in-out;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form button:hover{background-color:#eee}@media screen and (max-width:600px){div#app div#login{align-items:unset;background-color:unset;display:unset;justify-content:unset}div#app div#login div#description{margin:0 auto;max-width:350px;text-align:center;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form{border-radius:unset;box-shadow:unset;width:100%}div#app div#login div#form form{margin:0 auto;max-width:280px;width:100%}}
